label: 顔料
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: A general term referring to pigments, but more precisely it refers to coloring agents that dissolve neither in water nor in oil. Calcium carbonate (white) and mercurite (red) are examples. These are mixed with animal glue as an adhesive to create earth pigments.
